thread.title: New CEO takes the helm at United AIrlines
thread.title_full: New CEO takes the helm at United AIrlines

author: eTN Editor
title: New CEO takes the helm at United AIrlines
text:
New CEO takes the helm at United AIrlines Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 08, 2015 Oscar Munoz eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
CHICAGO, Illinois – United Continental Holdings, Inc. today announced that it has named a new CEO and president. 
Oscar Munoz has been named to the position and will also continue to serve on United’s board of directors. The board appointed Henry L. Meyer III, United’s lead independent director, to serve as non-executive chairman of the board of directors. The company also announced that Jeff Smisek has stepped down from his roles as chairman, president and chief executive officer, and as a director. These changes are effective immediately.
